## About Me

**Welcome!** I’m **Yiwei Lu (David)** — a Business Analytics graduate from UC Irvine with a focus on transforming data into clear, actionable insights. My background spans projects in healthcare, e-commerce, and technology, where I’ve worked closely with data to support business decisions, streamline operations, and enhance user experiences. I enjoy working at the intersection of data, strategy, and communication — helping teams understand not just what the numbers say, but what they mean.

Outside of work, I’m a curious learner who enjoys exploring tech trends, visual storytelling, and problem-solving challenges. I also love to travel, explore new cultures, and capture moments through photography. My free time often includes hiking, snowboarding, badminton, and the occasional adventure off the beaten path—whether it’s trying a new trail or discovering a hidden coffee shop in a new city. Whether in the workplace or beyond, I believe in asking thoughtful questions, staying open-minded, and building connections through shared goals.

<!-- ② 居中弹窗 + 防止原页跳走：JS -->
<script>
  function openContactWin(e, a){
    e.preventDefault(); // 先拦截默认跳转（解决“弹窗+原页跳走”）

    // 小屏直接当前页打开
    if (window.matchMedia && window.matchMedia('(max-width:640px)').matches){
      window.location.href = a.href;
      return false;
    }

    // 用 outerWidth/outerHeight + screenX/screenY 居中，兼容多显示器与缩放
    const w = 780, h = 760;
    const sx = (window.screenX ?? window.screenLeft ?? 0);
    const sy = (window.screenY ?? window.screenTop ?? 0);
    const ow = (window.outerWidth  ?? window.innerWidth);
    const oh = (window.outerHeight ?? window.innerHeight);
    const left = Math.max(0, Math.round(sx + (ow - w)/2));
    const top  = Math.max(0, Math.round(sy + (oh - h)/2));
    const opts = `popup=1,width=${w},height=${h},left=${left},top=${top},resizable=yes,scrollbars=yes`;

    const win = window.open(a.href, 'contactWin', opts);
    if (win){
      try { win.focus(); } catch {}

      // 点击位置涟漪效果
      const rect = a.getBoundingClientRect();
      const r = document.createElement('span');
      r.className = 'ripple';
      r.style.left = (e.clientX - rect.left) + 'px';
      r.style.top  = (e.clientY - rect.top ) + 'px';
      a.appendChild(r);
      setTimeout(()=>r.remove(), 500);
    } else {
      // 被拦截则回退为同页跳转
      window.location.href = a.href;
    }
    return false;
  }
</script>

<!-- ③ 居中按钮（只改这里） -->
